person.persName: Hamilton Bruce (Harrison Co., Kentucky, saddler and farmer)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, saddler and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy O. Adams Bruce in Harrison County, Kentucky, in October 1853. Father of Luella Bruce. Saddler in Harrison County in 1850. Saddler in Harrison County in 1860. Farmer in Harrison County in 1863.
